description: The standard binder. Executes a dispatcher when the key is pressed.
help: Ej: bind = SUPER, Q, exec, kitty

description: Repeat binder. Will repeat when held down.
Release binder. Will trigger on release of a key.
help: Ej: bindr = SUPER, SUPER_L, exec, wofi

description: Ignore mods binder. Will ignore any modifiers and trigger regardless.
help: Ej: bindi = , XF86AudioMute, exec, pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ toggle

description: Mouse binder. Used for binding mouse actions to dispatchers.
Transparent binder. Will let the key event pass to the application as well.
Locked binder. Works even if the screen is locked.
help: Ej: bindl = , XF86AudioPlay, exec, playerctl play-pause

description: Locked and Repeat binder. Combination of bindl and binde.
help: Ej: bindle = , XF86AudioRaiseVolume, exec, wpctl set-volume @DEFAULT_AUDIO_SINK@ 5%+

description: Non-consuming binder. The key event will be passed to the next binder even if it matches this one.
